#summary jsCore Pair property.
#labels Phase-Implementation

*syntax:*
{{{
object.Pair("property") ' [variant]
object.Pair(Null) ' [variant]
object("property") ' [variant]
object(Null) ' [variant]
}}}

Manuplate data structure on the jsCore object. If property have a `Null` value then taken a autoproperty. Autoproperties contain a ordered numbers.

== Samples ==
{{{
<!--#include file="JSON_lastest.asp"-->
<%
Dim n
Set n = jsObject()

n.Pair("name") = "tuğrul"
n("surname") = "topuz"
n(Null) = Array(2, 4, 6, 8)
n(Null) = "the end"

n.Flush
%>
}}}
=== Value contains a jsCore objects (jsArray, jsObject) ===
{{{
<!--#include file="JSON_lastest.asp"-->
<%
Dim m, i
Set m = jsArray()

Sub AddUser(name, surname)
        Set m(Null) = jsObject()
        m(Null)("name") = name
        m(Null)("surname") = surname
End Sub

AddUser "tuğrul", "topuz"
AddUser "nasrettin", "hoca"
AddUser "cin", "ali"

m.Flush
%>
}}}
